remarks: The subspace sum of a closed subspace and a kernel orthocomplement is closed.  ( ~ djhlsmcl can be used to convert sum to join.)  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dochkrsm.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochkrsm.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochkrsm.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochkrsm.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochkrsm.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dochkrsm.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
dochkrsm.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
dochkrsm.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochkrsm.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
dochkrsm.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
dochkrsm $p |- ( ph -> ( X .(+) ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) ) e. ran I ) $.
